name: Hiro Fodder: A Blue Hope - A late 16-bit era inspired RPG
blurb: Hiro Fodder: A Blue Hope is an uproarious yet heartfelt and story-driven retro RPG influenced by the 16-bit era SNES classics.

rewards.reward: Tonic Tier \u2013 Enjoy a minor boost to your HP and special thanks in the Game Credits.
Potion Tier \u2013 In addition to a moderate HP gain, you\u2019ll receive a digital copy of the game. (Plus previous reward tiers)
Tincture Tier \u2013 Have some MP to go with those extra hit points, and here, have a digital copy of the complete soundtrack while you\u2019re at it. (Plus previous reward tiers)

Remedy Tier \u2013 Cure those pesky status ailments. We\u2019ll also throw in a digital art booklet consisting of over 100 images including concept art, combat backgrounds and sprite art. (Plus previous reward tiers)

Hi-Potion Tier \u2013 Restores a significant portion of HP and gives you a fully illustrated digital bestiary of the game (over 60 enemies) \u2013 great for when you are stuck on a tricky boss! (Plus previous reward tiers)

Monster In a Box Tier - Limited Edition Reward - Sometimes treasure chests are not as innocuous as they seem, but we promise if you defeat the monster that lurks inside, you'll be handsomely rewarded. Also included will be a personalized thank you video from one of the heroes from Hiro Fodder. Which hero thanks you and where they thank you from will be entirely up to you! Oh, and guess what? If you've already pledged $60 dollars or more, you've already earned this prize! (Plus previous tier rewards)

Ether Tier \u2013 Phew, it\u2019s tough to win battles without MP, so have a moderate amount on us. In addition we will use your likeness to create your very own in-game NPC. Just remember \u2013 humans are the bad guys in this game! You'll also receive a digital copy of both the game and the soundtrack.

Fenix Down Tier \u2013 One "life"time membership coming right up! Not only will you receive the digital copy and soundtrack of Hiro Fodder: A Blue Hope, but we promise to give you a free copy of every game we ever create. And mark my words - we have several projects lined up. We\u2019ll throw in the digital art booklet and bestiary to boot.

X-Potion \u2013 Full HP and a laminated Overworld poster signed by the team \u2013 oh joy! You\u2019ll also receive the lifetime membership, and everything from the $50 tier downwards. (Please add an additional $15 dollars for International shipping.)

Developer Tier - You'll receive a special in-game item that will allow you to turn enemies into one of the team members from Divergent Games (we're really weak). Limited Charges only. In addition, we'll throw in the lifetime membership, digital and physical copies of Hiro Fodder, the art booklet, the bestiary, the thank you video, the laminated overworld and the NPC likeness. As a special bonus, you'll receive a free copy of our director's cut featuring developer commentary. (Please allow 3-4 extra months for delivery) As always, anyone who has already pledged more than $200 will also be entitled to the rewards in this tier. (Please add an additional $15 dollars for International shipping.)

X-Ether \u2013 Along with full MP you\u2019ll receive the ultimate Hiro Fodder package including the following: The final Game Design Document, a Hiro Fodder wallpaper, the laminated Overworld map, the bestiary, the art booklet, digital AND physical copies of the game and soundtrack, and a digital copy of every game we ever create.  (Please add an additional $15 dollars for International shipping.)

Elixir Tier \u2013 Full MP and HP for one party member \u2013 does it get any better than that? Yes! How about an in-game Shrine built in your honor? Your name and generous contribution will be eternalized in Hiro Fodder: A Blue Hope. You can even meet with our team on Skype to discuss the Shrine's design. Everything in the $250 tier plus a limited edition Divergent Games t-shirt will also be included! (Please add an additional $15 dollars for International shipping.)

Tent Tier - You'll sleep well knowing that you and your party will be fully revived in the morning. You'll receive everything in the $500 tier plus a bound physical version of the art booklet featuring special art not found in the digital copy. (Please add an additional $25 dollars for International shipping.)

Mega-Potion Tier \u2013 Yeeeahhh, full HP for everyone! In addition, we\u2019ll make one of the final bosses look like you. Heck, we\u2019ll even name him or her after you. If you\u2019ve ever wanted to be a villain in a video game, now is your chance \u2013 just one available. Also included in the Mega-Elixir Tier is everything from the $250 tier.  (Please add an additional $15 dollars for International shipping.)

Mega-Elixirs can get you and your party out of the most precarious situations. They also grant you the ability to teleport (and by teleport we mean fly economy class) to New York City for our release party. That\u2019s right - we\u2019ll fly you into the Big Apple (Domestic flights only) and put you up for the night. You\u2019ll hang out with the team, we\u2019ll share stories and drink\u2026punch! You\u2019ll be our guest of honor! Also included in the Mega-Elixir Tier is everything from the $250 tier and our limited edition Divergent Games t-shirt.
